service.name: Australian Victim of Terrorism Overseas Payment
service.description: The Australian Victim of Terrorism Overseas Payment (AVTOP) is a one-off payment that provides assistance to a: primary victim  - a person who was  harmed as a direct result  of a declared overseas terrorist act, and/or; secondary victim - a person who is the  close family member of a deceased person , who died as a  direct result of a declared overseas terrorist act. The AVTOP is non-taxable and is not to be treated as compensation.
